## Arithmetic expressions

```{r}
1 + 2
3 * 5
4 / 7
5 %% 3
5 %/% 3
5 ^ 3
ceiling(3.1415)
tan(3.1415)
min(3, 4, 5)
```

### Checking operator precedence rules

```{r}
1 + 2 * 3
(1 + 2) * 3
```


## Incomplete expressions

```{r}
5 +
  3
5
+ 3
```
